summary: Completed comprehensive testing of zenXteknoloji e-commerce website. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly. 13/13 backend tests passed, all frontend features tested successfully including homepage, search, product details, category filtering, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: GET /api/categories returns 5 categories (Laptop, Masaüstü Bilgisayar, Monitör, Ekran Kartı, RAM)
GET /api/products returns product list with proper structure
GET /api/products with category filter works correctly
Homepage loads with hero section and product grid
Category sidebar displays all categories and filters work
Search functionality works from header search bar
Product detail page shows complete product info and contact details
Footer displays all contact information and address correctly
Mobile responsive design with mobile menu and filter buttons
Product cards display with image, name, model, stock status, price
